title: Small Indian banks back online after ransomware attack, payments authority says
description: About 300 small Indian banks were temporarily offline following a ransomware attack on C-Edge Technologies, which provides tech services to the banks. The National Payments Corporation of India isolated these banks to contain the attack, which has now been resolved. A forensic review confirmed the breach did not extend to the banks' own systems.
